long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is useful for YNAP developers to check the data returned by the APIs.
In fact, it is sometimes difficult to consult them because you have to remember the various necessary parameters.
This extension handles the API call for you depending on the necessary parameters you enter, formatting the JSON response with the Monaco editor to make it more readable
